author: Anne Kenny

review: I really want to love this thing. And I kind of do. No I really do. BUT it freezes randomly dropping frames while playing back video periodically. Mostly in other apps and not in it's native Amazon Prime player. Netflix suffers the most I think. I can't stand dropped frames. My chromcast by comparison NEVER drops frames. I mean never. I've never seen it ever happen. My network will stop the stream or cut off sometimes but it's never dropped frames or froze. With the Fire Stick It's kind of like when flash player on your computer gets over loaded and needs to catch up, or your memory has issues. I'm positive it's not the network as it's solid most of the time where as the Firestick simply just lags. Like I said more like when you're using flash on a computer.
